entry_requirements_raw.Diploma: Any Diploma in science and technology with a minimum CGPA of 2.50.  Credit in Additional Mathematics at SPM level
entry_requirements_raw.STPM:
Grade of C (GPA 2.00) in any of the 2 subjects.  Credit in the following subjects at SPM level or equivalent:
-Additional Mathematics; or
-Mathematics and one of the subjects of Science, Technology or Engineering
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation:
CGPA of 2.00.  Credit in the following subjects at SPM level or equivalent:
-Additional Mathematics; or
-Mathematics and one of the subjects of Science, Technology or Engineering
